Articles.Content:
Before you go off looking for my twitch name, I'm not currently streaming, BUT I have set up a place to stream and will be tomorrow hopefully most all day. playing various games, depending on what whoevers watching wants/what I have.

I use FFSplit, I learned it quickly and find it easy to use, and I streamed KSP tonight, just ended the stream, I need to set up nightbot, and need a mod or two to help out, any volunteers?

P.S. My twitch is Kozak_Xersion

Edited August 29, 2015 by Kozak
Starting the stream now! if anyone wants to join it's Twitch.tv/Kozak_Xersion
Come on down and watch! we're playing KSP on the stream!
Sorry, EnterElysium's stream is just about to start, and I'd prefer to watch From the Depths anyways. Maybe some other time.
Streams over, 27 viewers, raided someone forget who. Glad to be streaming again!
Will start today's stream a little later than usual, at around 3:30, maybe earlier though. Will post when its started!
Alrighty! Starting the stream up in a second, loading up KSP now!

Streams been up for an hour and a half lol 0 viewers

- - - Updated - - -

Stream ended, one person came, complained about me using MechJeb for DV stats and left.

Streams been up for an hour and a half lol 0 viewers

- - - Updated - - -

Stream ended, one person came, complained about me using MechJeb for DV stats and left.

It's tricky. I think the most viewers I've ever gotten was somewhere between 6 and 15 during a StarMade stream. And that was pretty much a fluke. Most of my streams I get maybe one or two viewers.
I NEVER do streams...I am still in the planning and waiting phase for my STS History series

It's tricky. I think the most viewers I've ever gotten was somewhere between 6 and 15 during a StarMade stream. And that was pretty much a fluke. Most of my streams I get maybe one or two viewers.

This is pretty much how streams go for me. Having more than 2 people feels like an accomplishment, especially if they are being active in chat. I've had to cancel some streams due to not getting enough viewers (mainly Rocket League ones). Recently I've been trying to attract more viewers by having my streambadge on my sig, and then posting in a bunch of threads just before I start the stream. It's a bit devious, but it seems to be working.
